description.full: When one man is not enough, it will take an army of two to fight through war, political turmoil and a conspiracy so vast it threatens the entire world.  Some multi-player functionalities may no longer be supported.
description.short: When one man is not enough, it will take an army of two to fight through war, political turmoil and a conspiracy so vast it threatens the entire world.  Some multi-player functionalities may no longer be supported.
